channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Asus ProArt PZ13 Review: A Cheaper Surface Pro
item.description: It has some flaws, but this Asus detachable 2-in-1 laptop is a much cheaper version of Microsoft’s Surface Pro.

item.title: Last chance to become a volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: We are officially less than a month away from TechCrunch Disrupt 2024, taking place at Moscone West in San Francisco from October 28-30. We’re current...

item.title: Oasis opts out of Ticketmaster’s dynamic pricing, calling it ‘an unacceptable experience for fans’

item.title: The Best Kindle to Buy in 2024
item.description: Here’s how Amazon’s ebook readers stack up—and which one might be right for you.

item.title: Epic Games Is Suing Samsung Now
item.description: After suing both Apple and Google over app store payment policies, Fortnite developer Epic Games now has its sights on Samsung.

item.title: Everything you need to know about VPNs
item.description: We break down what virtual private networks, or VPNs, do and don’t do, because using a VPN can be as dangerous as not using one. © 2024 TechCrunch. Al...

item.title: 15 Best Keyboards for PC (2024): Gaming and Work
item.description: Whether you’re looking to boost your productivity or your Fortnite stats, these are the top typing peripherals for the job.

item.title: We are skeptical of VPN providers, and you should be, too
item.description: You cannot and and should not trust either free or paid-for VPN providers. Here's why. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
